Claim: "People are attending an outdoor art festival."
Implication: "A few people are sitting inside a building with lots of photography on the walls."
Referring expressions: People, outdoor art festival.  A few people, building, photography on the walls.
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsAttending(a,b)))) -> (exists e (exists c (exists d ((IsSitting(c) and IsInBuilding(d)) and HasPhotographyOnWalls(e)))))
